name: Julie Ann Mercouris (Meyer)
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Communication Training, Content Creation, Content Marketing, Funnel Creation Tools, Sales Training, Video Marketing
what_you_do: President of Achieve TV, leading a mission to amplify the voices of leaders with a mission, message, and valuable education to share with the world. Also a TV show host of 'Own Your Wellness' with expertise in health and wellness.
who_you_serve: Leaders with a mission, thought leaders, entrepreneurs, and individuals seeking health and wellness transformation.
social_proof: Featured on TV show 'World's Greatest Motivators', featured in LA Tribune's Female Thought Leaders Special Edition, contributing author to 'Moral Compass' and 'Achieve Wellness', interviewed by Small Business Trendsetters and Business Innovators, co-hosted Think & Grow Rich Institute Summit with the LA Tribune.
signature_programs: Own Your Wellness (TV show), Achieve Wellness (book, contributing author), Moral Compass (book, contributing author)
business_focus: Amplifying the voices of leaders through media and promoting health and wellness transformation.
service_provided: TV network leadership, TV show hosting, media promotion for thought leaders, health and wellness coaching
